name: Young Shadow Dragon
movement: 40 ft. walk, 40 ft. climb, 80 ft. fly, 40 ft. swim
description: A large dragon that embodies darkness with a majestic yet sinister appearance, capable of moving through objects and creatures.
memorable: It has an essence link to a specific area, causing fatigue and strife in intruders, while its Anguished Breath can significantly alter a battle.
goals: To protect its essence area and dominate over weaker creatures.
relations: Related to other dragons; may command lesser shadow creatures.
environment: Usually found in dark places tied to its essence, such as ancient ruins or shadowy forests.
strengths: Possesses high physical and mental capabilities, resistant to many damage types, and immune to necrotic damage.
weaknesses: Vulnerable when separated from its essence link; cannot regain hit points away from its linked area.
attacks: Uses multiattack consisting of a powerful bite and slashing claw strikes.
most_powerful_ability: Anguished Breath, exhaling a damaging shadowy maelstrom that instills fear.
senses: Has darkvision up to 240 feet and a passive perception of 15, aiding it in stealthy and hidden environments.
skills: Notably skilled in deception and stealth, making it a cunning predator.
additional_information: Radiates an Evil aura that establishes its menacing presence.
Incorporeal movement allows passing through creatures and objects.
Innate spellcasting of darkness and detect evil and good for battlefield control.
Immune to conditions like frightened and paralyzed, enhancing combat longevity.
Resistance to various elemental damages aids in survival.
spellcasting: Can innately cast darkness and detect evil and good three times per day each.
test_queries: dragon that can move through walls
shadow dragon with a breath attack
dragon linked to a specific area
